organizations.name: institute of chartered accountants of india/ institute of cost accountants of india for post
computer science/ computer application/ information technology

text: 6. Information Technology: 02 Posts 7. Information Technology (SAP): 02 Posts Age Limit: Candidates age limit should be not exceed 30 years as on 28-02-2017. Age relaxation is applicable to 05 years for SC/ ST candidates, 03 years for OBC (Non Creamy Layer) candidates & 10 years for PWD Candidates. Educational Qualification : Candidates should possess Degree in Mechanical/ Electrical/ Electronics/ Civil/ Instrumentation Engineering for Sl No 01 to 05, Engineering Degree in Computer Science/ Information Technology or Masters Degree in Computer Science/ Computer Application/ Information Technology for Sl No 06 & 07 with 60% of marks from a recognized University with relevant experience. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on personal interview. Application Fee: Candidates should pay Rs. 200/- through online remitted using Online payment options (Debit card/ Credit card/ Internet Banking). No fee for SC/ ST/ PWD Candidates. How to Apply : Eligible candidates may apply online through the website www.cochinshipyard.com from 13-02-2017 to 28-02-2017. Instructions to Apply Online: 1. Before applying online candidates should have valid e mail id & passward 2. Candidates log on the website www.cochinshipyard.com 3. Click on Careers & selct the desired post 4. Read all instructions & fill all the details 5. Check once before submit the form 6. Now take a print out of online application for future use. Important Dates: Starting Date to Apply Online: 13-02-2017 Last Date to Apply Online: 28-02-2017 For more details like experience, reservation, duration & other information click on the link given below…. Click here to Apply Online – Cochin Shipyard Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for Manager Posts: Cochin Shipyard Limited, Kochi has invited applications for the recruitment of Assistant General Manager, Deputy Manager (Ship repair)- Mechanical, Deputy Manager (Ship repair) -Electrical vacancies. Eligible candidates may apply online from 25-01-2017 to 28-02-2017. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process, application fee & how to apply are given below…. Cochin Shipyard Vacancy Details: Total No. of Posts: 03 Name of the Posts: 1. Assistant General Manager: 01 Post 2. Deputy Manager (Ship repair)- Mechanical: 01 Post 3. Deputy Manager (Ship repair) -Electrical: 01 Post Age Limit: Candidates age limit should be not exceed 50 years for Post 1, 35 years for Post 2, 3 as on 28-02-2017. Upper age relaxation is applicable to 05 years for SC/ ST candidates, 03 years for OBC (Non Creamy Layer) candidates & 10 years for PWD Candidates. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess Degree in Mechanical/ Naval Architecture/ Marine Engineering for Post 1, Degree in Mechanical Engineering for Post 2, Degree in Electrical Engineering for Post 3 with a minimum of 60% marks from a recognized University & relevant experience. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on Merit, Experience, Power Point Presentation, Group Discussion, Personal Interview. Application Fee: Candidates should pay Rs. 500/- through online using Debit card/ Credit card/ Internet Banking. No fee for SC/ ST/ PWD Candidates. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may apply online through the website www.cochinshipyard.com from 25-01-2017 to 28-02-2017. Instructions to Apply Online: 1. Before applying online candidates should have valid Email ID & Password. 2. Candidates log on the website www.cochinshipyard.com. 3. Click on Careers & select the desired post. 4. Click on Registration & login. 5. Read all instructions & fill all the details. 6. Check once before submit the form. 7. Now take a print out of online application for future use. Important Dates: Starting Date to Apply Online: 25-01-2017. Last Date to Apply Online: 28-02-2017. For more details like experience, reservation, duration & other information click on the link given below…. Click here to Apply Online Cochin Shipyard Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for Trainee & Manager Posts: Cochin Shipyard Limited, Kochi has invited applications for the recruitment of Executive Trainee (Finance), Assistant General Manager (Finance) vacancies. Eligible candidates may apply online from 13-02-2017 to 15-03-2017. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process, application fee & how to apply are given below…. Cochin Shipyard Vacancy Details: Total No. of Posts: 02 Name of the Posts: 1. Executive Trainee (Finance): 01 Post 2. Assistant General Manager (Finance): 01 Post Age Limit: Candidates age limit should be not exceed 25 years for Post 1, 35 years for Post 2 as on 15-03-2017. Upper age relaxation is applicable to 05 years for SC/ ST candidates, 03 years for OBC (Non Creamy Layer) candidates & 10 years for PWD Candidates. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess Degree from a recognized University and pass in the final examination of the Institute of Chartered Accountants of India/ Institute of Cost Accountants of India for Post 1, with relevant experience for post 2. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on Written Test, Group Discussion, Personal Interview. Application Fee: Candidates should pay Rs. 400/- through online using Debit card/ Credit card/ Internet Banking. No fee for SC/ ST/ PWD Candidates. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may apply online through the website www.cochinshipyard.com from 13-02-2017 to 15-03-2017. Instructions to Apply Online: 1. Before applying online candidates should have valid Email ID & Password. 2. Candidates log on the website www.cochinshipyard.com. 3. Click on Careers & selct the desired post. 4. Click on Registration & login. 5. Read all instructions & fill all the details. 6. Check once before submit the form. 7. Now take a print out of online application for future use. Important Dates: Starting Date to Apply Online: 13-02-2017. Last Date to Apply Online: 15-03-2017.
